application.doc: Retrieve fix packs FIPS mode setting

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve fix packs FIPS mode setting
method.doc: To retrieve the current FIPS mode setting with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the fix packs/fipsmode URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: fipsmode
param.doc: Indicates whether FIPS mode is set or not. This is either "true" or "false".
